body.p: The exposure draft proposed that such a loan should be classified as non‑current if it is due for settlement, without the breach, at least twelve months after the balance sheet date and:

li.p: the entity rectifies the breach within the period of grace; or
when the financial statements are authorised for issue, the period of grace is incomplete and it is probable that the breach will be rectified.
